scripts.clean-modules: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('node_modules', { recursive: true, force: true }); require('fs').rmSync('.turbo', { recursive: true, force: true })" && pnpm -r exec node -e "require('fs').rmSync('node_modules', { recursive: true, force: true }); require('fs').rmSync('.next', { recursive: true, force: true }); require('fs').rmSync('.turbo', { recursive: true, force: true })"
